quest.name: Worm in the Ointment
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The seasoned scavenger has one last favor to ask.
objectives: Use the blunt knife at the designated locations to catch rock wrigglers.
Deliver the rock wrigglers to the quick-witted scavenger.

dialogue.name: NOVICESCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: Not just pretty, but valuable, too! Thank you!

dialogue.name: EXPERTSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: There is one last thing I would ask of you, if I may be so bold.

dialogue.name: EXPERTSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: We are now ready to return to Twine, but I am afraid that I picked up a rather nasty injury while fending off those beasts.

dialogue.name: EXPERTSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: It is not serious, and should heal in time, but it will take a while for me to complete the return journey. I would be grateful if you could go ahead and let our friend know that we are on our way back. We will see you in Twine!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: So, did you find my fellow scavengers?

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: I am so relieved! My reputation is safe! And also, my friends are not dead!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: But one of them is injured, you say? I should make sure he at least reaches Twine before he keels over... Unfortunately, we Mord do not heal in the same way as Humes or Ronso, so their treatments will not work on us.

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: He will need freshly prepared ointment to seal the wound, made according to our traditional recipe. While I can get most of the ingredients here in Twine, I still need two plump, juicy rock wrigglers.

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: If you could go and catch them for me, I will take care of the rest!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: They like to hide in the crags, so try hooking them out with this knife. Time is of the essence, so please do not dilly or dally!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: Rock wriggler blood is very sticky, so we use them for ointments. But remember, you must never try to eat one, unless you like having your tongue stuck to the roof of your mouth!

dialogue.name: EXPERTSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: Thank you for passing on my message. It seems you have been rather busy in our absence!

dialogue.name: NOVICESCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: We would have arrived a lot sooner if he was not limping the whole way!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: Excellent! Once I've squeezed out their blood and mixed it with the other ingredients, the ointment will be ready!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: But before we leave, my friends wish to offer their thanks.

dialogue.name: EXPERTSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: You were under no obligation to help us, but you did so without a thought for your own safety. We will never forget you!

dialogue.name: NOVICESCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: And the rest of Twine is sure to be impressed by our adventures! I am glad to be alive to tell the tale!

dialogue.name: MORDSCAVENGER03505
dialogue.text: Your deeds will live on in the stories we share with our children, and our children's children! Fare thee well!
